meanings.definition: Fastened or secured with adhesive tape.
meanings.sent1: The gift box was taped shut.
meanings.sent2: She had a taped note on her desk.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny with its tail taped to its body.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a taped-up puzzle, fragile yet whole.
meanings.sent5: The image of the taped door stuck in her mind.

meanings.sent2: They watched a taped performance of the play.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped a taped song in harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her memories played like a taped movie in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The taped voice echoed through the room.

meanings.sent2: The box was neatly taped all around.
meanings.sent3: She wore a taped ribbon in her hair.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches looked like taped arms reaching out.
meanings.sent5: The room was a taped masterpiece of colors.
